entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Arctic Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:26 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -37.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Arctic Bay Airport 5:00 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Temperature: -37.8°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Humidity: 63 %
Dewpoint: -42.3°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 42. Wind chill minus 44 this evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 34.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 34. Wind chill minus 55 in the morning and minus 46 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late in the evening. Low minus 36. Wind chill near minus 51. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
